sentences.en: DAKAR, NewsCore - Wearing white to symbolise purity, worshippers throughout this African capital gathered to pray on one of the final nights of Ramadan.
sentences.cn: 达喀尔，新闻报导—这个非洲国家的礼拜者们穿上代表纯洁的白色衣服聚集在首都，一起在斋月的最后一天祷告。

sentences.en: He is holding a book and pen, attributes used to symbolise his education.
sentences.cn: 他手里拿着一本书和一支笔, 借以标志着他受过教育.
而在佛教中,孔雀则象征着智慧.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages, men wore them to symbolise their courage and virility.
sentences.cn: 中世纪, 男人们佩戴钻石,作为勇敢和刚强的象征.

sentences.en: What does this strange mark symbolise?
sentences.cn: 这个奇怪的符号象征什么?

sentences.en: Whatever the holy sites of Bethlehem symbolise, it is not a world free of pain.
sentences.cn: 不论伯利恒的神圣地点象征着什么, 这个世界终究尚未脱离苦海.
